Package com.rubynaxela.kyanite.game.entities

Interface MouseActionListener

All Known Implementing Classes:
CircleButton, RectangleButton
public interface MouseActionListener
This interface serves the purpose of simplifying the handling of actions triggered by the mouse buttons.

  • Method Summary

    Modifier and Type
    Method
    Description
    boolean
    isCursorInside(@NotNull Vector2i cursorPosition)
    This method should be implemented in such a way that it returns true or false depending on whether the mouse cursor position is inside the object global bounds.
    default void
    mouseButtonPressed(@NotNull MouseButtonEvent event)
    Invoked when a mouse button was pressed, this object belongs to the window's current scene and the isCursorInside(com.rubynaxela.kyanite.math.Vector2i) returned true.
    default void
    mouseButtonReleased(@NotNull MouseButtonEvent event)
    Invoked when a mouse button was released, this object belongs to the window's current scene and the isCursorInside(com.rubynaxela.kyanite.math.Vector2i) returned true.

  • Method Details

    • isCursorInside

      boolean isCursorInside(@NotNull @NotNull Vector2i cursorPosition)
      This method should be implemented in such a way that it returns true or false depending on whether the mouse cursor position is inside the object global bounds. This method is necessary because not every entity has to have rectangular bounds. For instance, if the entity is circle-shaped and its origin in its middle, this method may look like this:
       boolean isCursorInside(@NotNull Vector2i cursorPosition) {
     final float deltaX = cursorPosition.x - getPosition().x;
     final float deltaY = cursorPosition.y - getPosition().y;
     final float r = getRadius();
     return deltaX * deltaX + deltaY * deltaY <= r * r;
 }
      Parameters:
      cursorPosition - the mouse cursor position
      Returns:
      whether the specified position is inside the object global bounds

    • mouseButtonPressed

      default void mouseButtonPressed(@NotNull @NotNull MouseButtonEvent event)
      Invoked when a mouse button was pressed, this object belongs to the window's current scene and the isCursorInside(com.rubynaxela.kyanite.math.Vector2i) returned true.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be processed

    • mouseButtonReleased

      default void mouseButtonReleased(@NotNull @NotNull MouseButtonEvent event)
      Invoked when a mouse button was released, this object belongs to the window's current scene and the isCursorInside(com.rubynaxela.kyanite.math.Vector2i) returned true.
      Parameters:
      event - the event to be processed
